ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 538
ygData.msgSnippet: /bazaar mode, and not having to spam a zone endlessly and ask a million times how much? or stats please /drool checked it out on the test server b4, and
ygData.messageBody:
/bazaar mode, and not having to spam a zone endlessly and ask a million
times "how much?" or "stats please"

/drool

checked it out on the test server b4, and finally got it all downloaded at
like 3am last night when the congestion got better
This mornin 7:30am est 237 ppl in bazaar
zone--------------------------laaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
aaagggggggggggggggggggg-
that's the only thing that's gonna suck about it :(


From: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>

Subject: [EverQuest] Digest Number 538

> Message: 1
> Date: Wed, 24 Jul 2002 13:11:31 -0700 (PDT)
> From: Toni <silly_girl4ever@...>
> Subject: New UI
>
>
> Hey, I was just wondering what everybody's thoughts on the new UI are.
I really like it, except the new spell icons, it will take a while to get
used to those. Everything else is pretty cool. It is really nice being
able to create multiple chat windows so you can get rid of battle spam &
such & you don't miss the important things =D
> Toni
>
>
>
>
> Toni aka Katashaka Naboombu
>
> Championsofwar
